stageList.title: Blossoming League of Nine Littérateurs
stageList.desc: We've entered the space of scattering yellow petals where the Golden Bough is resonating. It was the only place where Yi Sang may breathe as he put it. The Sinners are tasked with acting their parts of the script they're given, based on the place they're in. We're then greeted by Dongbaek from the past, accompanying a stunning fireworks display.

stageList.title: Blossoming League of Nine Littérateurs
stageList.desc: The Sinners are doing their best to play their roles, as awkward as it may be. Visited by sights of flowers and chirps of birds, the League of Nine was filled with joy and warmth even if it had become colorless.

stageList.title: Blossoming League of Nine Littérateurs
stageList.desc: Young-ji demonstrated the glass window, his new invention, to his fellow members. Some were astonished, while some showed concern. Shades of change were slowly beginning to cast over the League.

stageList.title: Blossoming League of Nine Littérateurs

stageList.title: Blossoming League of Nine Littérateurs
stageList.desc: During his time in the League, Yi Sang invented his reconstruction of Young-ji's glass window. In the invention, he meets his left-handed self.

stageList.title: Blossoming League of Nine Littérateurs

stageList.title: Blossoming League of Nine Littérateurs
stageList.desc: This time, we see a story that takes place somewhere far away. In a quiet corner of the Outskirts, stories of an unknown boy unfolds like stars lighting the night sky.

stageList.title: Blossoming League of Nine Littérateurs
stageList.desc: The place changes once more, and the Sinners are looking out at streets of T Corp's district. People deviod of color stoop on the roads.

stageList.title: Rowdy League of Nine Littérateurs
stageList.desc: Flowers fall as time passes, and the League of Nine grows noisy. At the time, no one knew whether this was simple noise or a step toward change.

stageList.title: Rowdy League of Nine Littérateurs
stageList.desc: As technology starts to be appraised for their worth, tiny cracks are heard being made amidst the League.

stageList.title: Rowdy League of Nine Littérateurs
stageList.desc: How nice it would have been if all stories told happy tales.

stageList.title: Rowdy League of Nine Littérateurs
stageList.desc: An outlandish item is placed at the center of the League's office. Looking back on the group's original purpose, the members' thoughts begin to clash.

stageList.title: Rowdy League of Nine Littérateurs
stageList.desc: Unfamiliar sounds occupy the League. The nine ceased to be nine, and things that weren't thought to be crimes turn into accusations.

stageList.title: Withering League of Nine Littérateurs
stageList.desc: The League of Nine Littérateurs was consumed in a colorless fire. In the shattering, Yi Sang chose to stop; in other words, he chose indifference.

stageList.desc: As time passed, Stephanette grew old, and K Corp. faces a new change.

stageList.title: N Corp. Cubic Room
stageList.desc: Taken by Gubo, Yi Sang was brought to a room entirely painted in white. He covered the time with a long silence, accompanied by the mirror.

stageList.title: N Corp. Cubic Room
stageList.desc: Leaving the room of squares, Yi Sang takes staggering steps to somewhere. And now, Dongrang's turn has come. At this point in the past, he'd leave for K Corp. and give the Wing his technology.

stageList.title: K Corp. Laboratory
stageList.desc: Leaving the room of squares, Yi Sang takes staggering steps to somewhere. And now, Dongrang's turn has come. At this point in the past, he'd leave for K Corp. and give the Wing his technology.

stageList.title: K Corp. Laboratory
stageList.desc: Fatally wounded, Dongrang is nearing his death in this distorted form. Could this be it? His eyes grow calm, as if looking at a once peaceful field in his memories.
